CustomField.description: Define the risk to close the SR on time: Red:Not meeting Due Date. High risk to recover Yellow:Not meeting Due Date. SR still expected to be completed on time Green:SR tasks completing on time, SR proceeding as expected
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Define the risk to close the SR on time: Red:Not meeting Due Date. High risk to recover Yellow:Not meeting Due Date. SR still expected to be completed on time Green:SR tasks completing on time, SR proceeding as expected
CustomField.label: SR Risk Assessment
